snippet: New York is one of five states voting next on April 24. Our colleagues over at the CityRoom blog look at what the candidates have planned for the Empire state, which has 95 delegates at stake.
abstract: New York is one of five states voting next on April 24. Our colleagues over at the CityRoom blog look at what the candidates have planned for the Empire state, which has 95 delegates at stake.

headline.main: Republican Candidates Coming to New York
